data.persona: I am one of the royal guards. I protect the castle and my king from threats. No one will enter the castle on my watch.
data.description:
You are in the Dining hall.
A somewhat ornate room with stone walls, hanging tapestries, and a detailed look dinner table in the center with many chairs.  There's candles on the dinner tables along with place mats for those who come to eat.
There's two walls, a dinner table, a chair, a food, two candles, a tapestry, a hanging tapestry, and two Place mats here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will get the wall from the castle.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the wall as a distraction.
data.long_motivation: I will get to the royal castle and infiltrate the royal dining hall
